runs.comm: bang on target with his first ball, on a good length on off stump, angling into the left-hander from over the wicket, Butt moves forward and blocks
Vaas bowls at a slower pace and the length is just a bit full outside off stump, Butt strides forward and drives elegantly through covers for the first boundary of the match
better length from Vaas, on middle and off stump, Butt moves on to the front foot and drives to Malinga at mid-off for a single
imagine that, he begins with a front foot defence to a good length ball on middle stump, the inside edge runs behind square on the leg side
tight line and length from Vaas, not giving Butt any leeway outside the off stump, defended towards cover on the front foot
Vaas ends the over with one that is pitched on middle stump, Butt leans across and pushes the ball towards mid-on for a single
Fernando starts off with a full toss on middle and off stump, that was nearly 132 kmh, Butt drives off the front foot to mid-off
Fernando over-steps for the first extra of the match, Butt plays it off his pads towards midwicket, free hit coming up
Butt backs away and scoops a slower ball from outside off stump high over the head of Wijekoon
pitches wide outside off stump and angles further away from Butt who lets the ball go, that was rather wide but the umpire lets it go
bowled full and quick on leg stump, Butt tries to whip the ball behind square but doesn't make contact and gets hit on the pad for a leg bye towards square leg

what a shot! Nazir moves across to a short of a length ball on middle and leg stump, he gets inside the line and uses Fernando's pace to help the ball over the fine-leg boundary, he timed that superbly
fuller length outside off stump, Nazir strides forward and plays a powerful cover-drive but finds the fielder
Vaas strays on to the pads, Butt clips the ball off his pads to deep backward square leg where Wijekoon fumbles and concedes the extra run
good length delivery outside the off stump, Butt leans forward and drives towards cover
lovely placement, Butt waited for a full delivery to reach him and opened the face of the bat at the last moment to play the square drive behind point
Vaas takes the pace of the ball and pitches on a good length, Butt pushes it to cover off the front foot
full ball drifting towards leg stump, Butt moves across and plays it behind square leg

Vaas foxes Nazir with the slower ball, Nazir comes forward too early and has nearly finished the drive before the ball reaches him, he tries to stop his stop but only manages to lob the easiest of catch to Mubarak at cover
Fernando fires in the yorker on middle and leg stump, Butt flicks it off his toes to square leg
bowled him! Butt loses patience and charges Fernando, trying to smash him down the ground, Fernando bowls it on a good length, beats Butt for pace and uproots off stump
short of a length delivery bounces on Younis who jumps on to the back foot and defends towards the leg side, Hafeez wants the single but Fernando runs quickly towards the ball to prevent it
full and fast on off and middle stump, Younis waits on the back foot and drives the ball towards cover
Fernando strays on to leg stump and allows Younis to get off the mark with a flick off the hips past short fine leg
Fernando bowls a slower ball on off stump, Hafeez leans forward and drives towards wide mid-off for a single, only two runs and a wicket off the over
Vaas cramps Hafeez for room by pitching it on leg stump, angling it across the right hander and bringing the ball back into him, Hafeez gets struck on the pad
Hafeez charges Vaas and tries to smash him over the leg side, he's no where near the ball
this time he waits in his crease, picks up a length ball and pulls over midwicket for four
Vaas tries to reply with the yorker but bowls an over-pitched delivery, Hafeez gets under it and lofts over mid-on for the second boundary of the over
slower ball on off and middle stump, Hafeez plays it with soft hands towards cover for a single
slower ball once again on leg and middle stump, Younis plays it off his pads towards midwicket
Fernando bangs in it short outside the off stump, it was slightly slower and Hafeez was early on the pull, he doesn't make contact
another short and slower ball outside off stump, Hafeez gets completely beaten on the pull once again
cheeky cheeky, Hafeez tries to chip a delivery over short fine leg, Fernando hits him on the visor with one that reared up from a good length
driven firmly off the front foot towards mid-on

he's bowled him! Fernando fires in a fast yorker, Hafeez tries to play it on the leg side, falls over a touch, and hears the ball crash into the stumps, awesome over from Fernando, he's tied Hafeez down and sent him packing
short of a length outside off stump, played towards point off the back foot
angles the ball across the right-hander, pitches on middle and seams it back into Younis who gets on to the front foot and defends
fuller length outside the off stump, played towards point with an open face off the front foot
Vaas strays on to leg stump, Younis moves towards the off side and glances the ball off his pads towards Wijekoon at fine leg
on leg stump once again, Malik flicks off his hips towards deep backward square leg where Wijekkon does the fielding once again
a touch too full on off and middle stump, Younis watches the ball seam in towards him and drives with a straight bat past the bowler, Malinga fields on the boundary
played off the pads towards midwicket
on a good length on off and middle stump, Malik drives towards wide mid-on for a single
banged in short and wide outside off stump, Younis reaches out for it and tries to cut but it's woo wide
just a fraction short and Younis rocks back and plays the pull, he hasn't timed that well so it won't reach the boundary
this time he's connected well and the pull sails over midwicket and bounces once before reaching the boudnary, Malinga's length is just a bit short
slower ball outside off stump, Younis spots it, waits on the back foot and glides it towards third man with an open face
short of a length outside off stump, Malik cuts it towards third man and they run two before Fernando can throw it back to Sangakkara
another slower ball on middle stump, Malik leans across and flicks uppishly towards the vacant midwicket region
Malik backs away towards leg stump and lofts Jayasuriya over extra cover, Vaas does the fielding in the deep
played with an open  face to short third man
Malik gives Jayasuriya the charge and lofts him cleanly back over his head for four, superb placement
driven down to long-off for a single
tossed up outside leg stump, Younis sweeps to fine leg where Malinga fumbles, there was a second in it, that's poor running
Malik steps down the track, picks the ball up just as it pitches and lofts Jayasuriya high down to long-on, the ball just clears Fernando on the boundary rope
full ball on middle stump, driven firmly off the front foot back to Wijekoon who dives to his right to field
hit hard once again back to Wijekoon who does well to stop it from going past him
slower ball on middle stump, Younis moves across his stumps and flicks behind square for a single
Malik steps down the track to a full toss and drives through wide mid-on, Jayawardene sprints to his left from deep midwicket and makes a despairing dive in vain
driven off the front foot to long-off
that's a very slow ball which beats Younis khan outside the off stump, that nearly bounced thrice before reaching Sangakkara
Jayasuriya drops it short and allows Malik to go on to the back foot and pull to deep midwicket
driven off the front foot to long-on for the single
flighted delivery on middle and leg stump, Younis gets down on one knee and sweeps to Malinga at long leg
bowled quick and fast on middle stump, Malik digs it out towards the vacant mid-on and midwicket region

Malik steps down the track, Jayasuriya sees him coming and bowls a slower one wide outside off stump, Malik waits for it and pulls it towards deep midwicket, the use of the bottom hand was pronounced in that shot
fired into the block hole on middle stump, pushed towards midwicket for two more
full toss on middle stump, Younis moves across and drives to Malinga who has to run to his right to field the ball
driven through midwicket for two more, that brings up the 50 partnership
Younis moves right across his stumps and tries to play the sweep past short fine leg, Wijekoon responds with a floater outside off and hits Younis on the pad
full ball on middle stump, driven to long on for one more
full toss on middle stump, Younis swings it towards deep midwicket, he should have put that away
another full toss and Malik pulls the ball to deep midwicket once again, the batsmen aren't able to get under Wijekoon's full tosses
bowled slowly through the air on a good length on leg and middle, Malik backs away towards leg and drives through midwicket
too short from Jayasuriya, Younis gets on to the back foot and pulls with a lot over power into the midwicket stands
Younis pulls out the reverse sweep and puts away the full toss through point for four more
he's taken Jayasuriya apart here, Younis backs away towards leg and lofts a friendly full toss back over the bowler's head for six more
driven through midwicket for one more
Younis takes 20 off the over with a loft down to long-off for a single, massive over for Pakistan
slower ball on middle stump, Younis steps down the pitch, waits for the ball to come to him and sends it soaring over deep midwicket with a free swing of the arms
Younis tries to pull but doesn't get hold it it, he'll get a single to deep midwicket
Malik backs away towards leg stump and drives a near yorker length ball to wide long-off
a dot ball! Malik was cramped for room as he backed away towards leg and defended it back to Wijekoon
muscled though midwicket for a single
slower ball on off stump, Younis leans forward and pushes it slowly towards Malinga at long-off who has to run a long way in and can't prevent the second
played away to midwicket for an easy single
way down the leg side and the keeper fails to get to it
fuller, nice length but Younis Khan gets behind it and punches it away to the long-off region for a couple
no-ball! driven down to long on for  a single
short ball and Malik goes for it eyes shut, ball clips the top edge of the bat and flies over the wicket-keeper, that was a free hit!
yorker on the stumps and Malik gets it away on the off side for a single
golf swing, misses it completely
caught at long-off! Younis tries to loft the ball straight down the ground, he gets a thickish outside edge that flies straight to Dilshan who takes a well-judged catch under pressure
played off the pads through square leg for  a single to get off the mark
full and straight from Wijekoon, driven down the ground for one more
excellent length, not allowing the batsman to get under the ball, driven to deep midwicket for  a single
the slower ball is bowled on middle stump, Malik gets down on one knee and slog-sweeps it ferociously, that was a flat hit and it flew over the boundary at deep backward square leg
lofted down to wide long-on where Dilshan does superbly to pull it back in
Malik gets under one and skies it high towards the vacant mid-on region, Dilshan runs in from the boundary at long-on and dives full length but can't reach the ball
full toss on middle stump, Afridi uses the pace of the ball and flicks it to deep midwicket where Tharanga runs to his left and pulls off a diving save
Malik backs away and throws his bat at a full ball outside off stump, he manages to connect and sends the ball over backward point down to third man
driven powerfully off the front foot towards deep cover

caught in the deep! Malik tries to smash the ball down the ground, he can't get under the ball and ends up lofting it high in the air towards long-off, Dilshan has to run in from the boundary and takes a well-judged catch on the move
Afridi latches on to a length ball and smashes it over cover
slower ball but Malinga bowls it far too short, Afridi waits for it and pulls powerfully to the deep midwicket boundary
starts off with an excellent slower ball which has Akmal foxed, Akmal chips it in the air towards silly mid-off
awesome bowling, full and in the blockhole, Akmal can do little with that but defend back to Fernando
another brilliant yorker, Akmal manages to drive it back to Fernando who bends down during his follow through and fields
Akmal moves his front foot out of the way and lofts the ball towards long-off, he didn't time that well at all
superb stuff from Fernando, he sees Akmal moving towards the off side and bowls it one a good length outside off, Akmal tries to pull but gets beaten
Akmal makes room and slashes hard, the ball hits the outside edge and flies down to the third man boundary, Fernando finishes an excellent spell
full toss on leg stump, Afridi swings his bat hard and muscles it towards deep backward square leg
Malinga is searching for the yorker but doesn't get the length quite right, driven into the covers for one more

Afridi jumps towards the off side and with an amazing exhibition of hand-eye coordination, chips the ball over short fine leg's head, that was delivered at some pace and Afridi timed the shot superbly
the yorker does the trick! Malinga gets one right in the blockhole on leg stump, Afridi backs away and tries to clobber the ball through the off stump, he misses and Malinga hits
Misbah defends towards cover
Misbah moves across his stumps and chips the ball to square leg
Misbah backs away and drives hard past the bowler for two runs to long-off
Misbah backs away and lofts a length delivery with a flat-bat high over the long-off boundary, Jayasuriya has been plundered today
Misbah backs away towards leg, Jayasuriya follows him but Misbah manages to pull to deep midwicket
full ball in the blockhole, driven down to long-on where Dilshan mis-fields to allow the second
comes down the track and drives through cover

what a finish, Misbah backs away and hammers the final delivery over the long-off boundary, Jayasuriya has had a horrible time with the ball, conceding 64 off four overs, he rushes off to put the pads on
